docs.snippet: Western governments fearful of terror attacks and the potential threat posed by refugees are adopting counterproductive policies in the name of security, Human Rights Watch said in its world report Wednesday....

docs.snippet: Mr. Vigoda was reported dead 34 years ago — erroneously — a story that stuck with him and helped make him a cult figure....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Vigoda was reported dead 34 years ago — erroneously — a story that stuck with him and helped make him a cult figure.
docs.abstract: Abe Vigoda, actor known for his roles in movie The Godfather and sitcom Barney Miller, dies at age 94; worked in Broadway and Off-Broadway theater until achieving big break later in life when he was cast as gangster in Francis Ford Coppola's movie.

headline.main: Abe Vigoda, of ‘Godfather’ and ‘Barney Miller,’ Dies at 94
headline.print_headline: Abe Vigoda, Actor Who Hit His Stride  as Mobster in ‘Godfather,’ Dies at 94

docs.snippet: Although prices fell as much as 30 percent after the 2008 global financial crisis, the housing market in Croatia has stabilized in recent years, and Dubrovnik remains the most expensive....
docs.lead_paragraph: Although prices fell as much as 30 percent after the 2008 global financial crisis, the housing market in Croatia has stabilized in recent years, and Dubrovnik remains the most expensive.
docs.abstract: International House Hunting column; three-bedroom 1910 stone villa on Lapad Bay in Adriatic Sea, near Dubrovnik, Croatia, is listed at $2.73 million; market and tips for buying in Croatia highlighted.

docs.snippet: France has asked its European Union partners to consider new sanctions on Iran for its recent missile tests, officials have told The Associated Press, even as Paris welcomed the president of the Islamic Republic, which is flush with funds from the...
docs.lead_paragraph: France has asked its European Union partners to consider new sanctions on Iran for its recent missile tests, officials have told The Associated Press, even as Paris welcomed the president of the Islamic Republic, which is flush with funds from the lifting of other sanctions over Tehran's nuclear program.

headline.main: France Asks EU Partners for New Sanctions on Iran
headline.print_headline: France Asks EU Partners for New Sanctions on Iran
